info.title: GitHub SSH Keys
info.description: This API is for retrieving lists of public SSH keys based on github usernames.

post.summary: List public SSH Keys based on username (or set of usernames)
post.description: Given a list of GitHub usernames, responds with list of public SSH keys for each User (associated to their GitHub account).

Keys.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.keys+json; view=default

keys.description: The list of the Github user's public SSH keys.

username.description: The username of the GitHub user.

Keys.description: Response Type for a GitHub User's list of public SSH Keys (default view)

KeysCollection.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.keys+json; type=collection; view=default
KeysCollection.description: KeysCollection is the media type for an array of Keys (default view)

UserKey.title: UserKey

id.description: The ID of the public SSH key on GitHub.

UserKey.description: Type for a GitHub user's public SSH Key
